Text:
Thanks for the share.

I've been running it ok with a serial from the keygen,
but unfortunately today, after a month 
I get that it has expired 
and this happens with every other serial I generate
and I get a "You're using a pirated or banned serial".

Update: after uninstalling & reinstalling it ,
it accepts again serial from the keygen with no problem :)

@torrentic

Thanks for the info, hopefully we can get someone to remove the call home functionality of the exe so it can't compare the serials.

Thank You!.
I using your keygen and download latest version from SyncBackPro homepage. Keygen was perfect!

Fix, temporary or not:
Go to C:\Users\YOURUSERNAME\AppData\Local\2BrightSparks\SyncBackPro
or (XP) C:\Documents and Settings\user\Local Settings\Application Data\2BrightSparks\SyncBackPro
Open Settings.ini. Delete lines
ID= ID2= SN= SN2=
Anyone know how to add a line to the windows hosts file to block call homes?

meatieSwe, your loophole works perfectly well.  My syncBack kept asking me for a serial and did not accept the old one, so I did what you suggested and evrything is back in fine territory.

Thanks.

@ meatieSwe, tks it worked for me tonite!!!
will c if it lasts lol
